article_title: More Cuts To Medicare Benefits On The Way

article_metadata.description: Get ready for more cuts to private Medicare plans, and more fired doctors, as insurers are forced to cheapen provider networks, and benefits. That’s the upshot from the announcement by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services that 2015 Medicare Advantage rates will be cut as much as a whopping 8%, [...]
article_metadata.author: Scott Gottlieb
